 Makes 5 servings.

LanguageData.MakePolenta.label: make two polenta
LanguageData.MakePolenta.description: Turns cornmeal into polenta. Polenta can be eaten raw, cooked into other meals, baked, or grilled. \n\nMakes 2 servings.

LanguageData.MakebulkPolenta.description: Turns cornmeal into polenta. Polenta can be eaten raw, cooked into other meals, baked, or grilled. \n\nMakes 10 servings.

LanguageData.VG_VeganEgg.label: make Vegan Egg Substitute
LanguageData.VG_VeganEgg.description: Vegan Egg Substitute is a egg shape product made from tofu, potatoes, or banana. Used in place of eggs in baking and other recipes. \n\nMakes 2.

LanguageData.VG_VeganEggBulk.description: Vegan Egg Substitute is a egg shape product made from tofu, potatoes, or banana. Used in place of eggs in baking and other recipes. \n\nMakes 8.
LanguageData.CookMakiRoll.label: prepare four maki roll
LanguageData.CookMakiRoll.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of rice rolled with raw fish and/or raw plant ingredients. \n\nMakes 4 rolls. Is a fine meal.
LanguageData.Make_Nigiri.label: Prepare four nigiri
LanguageData.Make_Nigiri.description: Prepare nigiri from rice and raw seafood or tofu. \n\nMakes 4 rolls. Is a fine meal.
